pages.title: Spring-Loaded Crossbow
pages.text: The <item>Spring-Loaded Crossbow/$ is an unwieldy but powerful weapon that takes the Crossbow's high damage but long prep time to extremes. It is able to do up to 50 damage per shot, but has to be re-wound after each shot.$(br2)The <item>Spring-Loaded Crossbow/$ is wound in an

<item>$(l:essentials:rotary/winding_table)Spring Winding Stand/$ to increase the spring speed the <item>weapon/$, up to 10 rad/s. The higher the wound speed, the higher the damage done with each shot, with diminishing returns. The minimum spring speed to shoot is 1 rad/s and does 5 damage, while the maximum speed of 10 rad/s does 50 damage per shot.$(br2)Right-clicking with a <item>Spring-Loaded Crossbow

<item>/$ wound to <em>at least/$ 1 rad/s will fire it, consuming any arrow as ammo. The entire spring speed is reset to 0 with each shot, requiring the weapon to be re-wound. The shot bullet travels faster and does more damage at higher spring speeds.$(br2)It's worth noting that the damage listed in the tooltip of the <item>Spring-Loaded Crossbow/$ is the damage
at <em>point blank range/$. As with a normal crossbow, actual damage dealt drops as the arrow travels further.$(br2)
